name: reddit-comments
description: Rounded comment boxes. Easy to read, alternating background colors.
css:
@-moz-document domain("reddit.com") {div.comment, div.message {background-color: #fff;border: 1px solid #bbbcbf;-moz-border-radius:8px;border-radius:8px;margin: 0px 5px 5px 0px!important;max-width: 1120px !important;margin-right:310px!important;}
div.comment div.comment,div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment,div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment,div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment,div.message div.message,div.message div.message div.message div.message,div.message div.message div.message div.message div.message div.message,div.message div.message div.message div.message div.message div.message div.message div.message {background-color:#eeeeee!important; margin-right:0px!important;}div.comment div.comment div.comment,div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment,div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment,div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment div.comment,div.message div.message div.message,div.message div.message div.message div.message div.message,div.message div.message div.message div.message div.message div.message div.message,div.message div.message div.message div.message div.message div.message div.message div.message div.message {background-color:#fff!important; margin-right:0px!important;}}
